sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { NgForm } from '@angular/forms'; import { User } from '../shared/user.model'; import { UserService } from '../shared/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user', templateUrl: './user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user.component.css'], providers: [UserService] }) export class UserComponent { constructor(public userService:UserService) {} onSubmit(form? : NgForm) {} resetForm(form?:NgForm) { if(form) form.reset(); this.userService.selectedUser={ } } }
